titleStmt.title: Samuel G. Suddarth, Receipt to Eli P. Metcalfe
CWG13708

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.idno: QMG Box 10; 1863 Office Expenses - Telegraph, Stationary - Transportation - Ordinance Stores; Bundle 3

body.p:
The United States
To Eli P. Metcalfe Dr

row.cell: To Transportation for Thirty-Four (34) men of Co E 10th Ky Cav from Augusta Ky. to Brookeville Ky. 9 miles by Stage. at fifty (50) cents each

body.p:
Approved
By order of the Governor
Jno. W Finnell
Adjt Genl Ky Vols
I certify that the above account is correct and just; that the services were rendered as stated. & that they were a necessary for the public service

W D Ratcliffe Capt
Co E 10 Ky Cav

Received at Louisville Frankfort Ky Sept 5 1863, of Col W Sewall Mustering & Disbursing Officer U. S. A. ^S. G. Suddarth Quartermaster Genl of Ky^ Seventeen Dollars & -- Cents, in full of the above account

No. 1 Abst U
Eli P. Metcalfe
$1700
Paid Sept. 5. 1863
AC
Transportation
J231
